storeid.label: Default store
storeid.comment: Set default Store View for X-POS. It can be switch to other when user opens X-POS.

offline_mode.label: Create Order Offline
offline_mode.comment: Enable to allow X-POS working when Internet connection is lost. If it's enable, it would require cache of Product to work properly

network_check_interval.label: Network check interval
network_check_interval.comment: Interval between network check requests (in seconds)

integrate_xmwh_enabled.label: Enable Multiple Warehouses
integrate_xmwh_enabled.comment: Enable X-Multi-Warehouse functionality (Please note, that X-Multi-Warehouse is a separate extension)

enable_till.label: Enable Tills
enable_till.comment: Tills can be setup in Sales > POS > Manage Tills

enabled_cashier.label: Enabled Cashiers
enabled_cashier.comment: Cashiers can be setup in Sales > POS > Manage Cashiers

offlinesearch.label: Cache of Product
offlinesearch.comment: Set to "Enable" if you want to save product data in your browser and work in Offline Mode. Set to "Disable" if you just want X-POS work online

prod_per_request.label: Product per request
prod_per_request.comment: Amount of product records per loading request

offlinesearch_customer.label: Cache of Customer
offlinesearch_customer.comment: Set to "Enable" if you want to save customer data in your browser and work in Offline Mode. Set to "Disable" if you just want X-POS work online

cust_per_request.label: Customer per request
cust_per_request.comment: Amount of customer records per loading request

searching_by.label: Fields used for searching
searching_by.comment: The more items selected, the slower the search

display_product_information.label: Display additional attributes of product when mouse hovers

attribute_for_display.label: Additional attributes of product when mouse hovers
attribute_for_display.comment: The more items selected, the slower the load

default_customer_id.label: Defaul Customer ID
default_customer_id.comment: You can select the default customer ID faster by clicking on button below

create_invoice.label: Create Invoice default
create_invoice.comment: Set if Invoice is default created on Checkout.

create_shipment.label: Create Shipment default
create_shipment.comment: Set if Shipping is default created on Checkout.

only_use_default_shipping.label: Use only Default Shipping Method
only_use_default_shipping.comment: X-POS will use the default shipping method to checkout, it will increase the speed while creating order

checkoutcomfirm.label: Confirm on Checkout
checkoutcomfirm.comment: Display prompt when user press Checkout button

printcashtransfer.label: Print on opening Cash Transfer
printcashtransfer.comment: This function makes it possible to open a cash drawer through a receipt printer

logo_image_file.label: Symbol Image
logo_image_file.comment: Currently only supports JPG, PNG, GIF format.

logo_literal.label: Literal Logo
logo_literal.comment: GUIDE: Make a logo by literally inputting characters. It will be showed off if a logo image is not set.

slogan_literal.label: Header Text
slogan_literal.comment: Your store's slogan. It will appear on the header of receipt

fore_message.label: Footer Message
fore_message.comment: GUIDE: The place where you can say thank you to your customer, or conditions of a returning back.

fore_gift_message.label: Gift Footer Message
fore_gift_message.comment: GUIDE: The place where you can say Conditions of a returning back.

addition_fields_to_display.label: Additional information to display in order sum-up

info_separator.label: Information Separator
info_separator.comment: Type of separator between information zones

hide_info_if_value_equal_zero.label: Remove Discount, Shipping if they equal zero

sales_template.label: New Order Confirmation Template for Sales

sales_emails.label: Send Order Email Copy To Sales

customer_template.label: New Order Confirmation Template for Customer

guest_template.label: New Order Confirmation Template for Guest

admin_zreport.label: Only use for Cashier has "Admin" permission

admin_xreport.label: Only use for Cashier has "Admin" permission

admin_linkreport.label: Only use for Cashier has "Admin" permission

denomination.label: Denomination
denomination.comment: Select a pre-configured list of denominations for use in Till report on counting cash.

custom_denomi.label: Custom Denomination
custom_denomi.comment: Saperate by comma. Ex: 1 cent : 0.01, $5 note : 5,...

default_transfer.label: Default Transfer Money
default_transfer.comment: Default amount placed in till upon closing a till. Amount can be modified when creating till report.

cronJob.label: Cron job update Product Data Schedule

heading_cron.label: Cronjob
heading_cron.comment: Optimized caching, remove unused data to increase speed of updating products

enable_cron_load_product.label: Cron job for updating product data

store_run.label: Store(s) used for load
store_run.comment: The more items selected, the slower the load

heading_integrate.label: Integrate
heading_integrate.comment: Optimized caching, remove unused data to increase speed of updating products
